profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess in a manner similar to that of CA 0.55. Use this profile when you are migrating data from a 0.55 installation to 0.6+

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative description. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive label or caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Physical description
label.description: Description of physical</strong> form of the object. Place descriptions of the content of an object (eg. the information contained in a book

label.name: Source of physical description
label.description: Source of physical description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Condition assessment
label.description: Description of current condition of the object.

label.name: Assessment of artifact needs
label.description: Description of current conservation needs.

label.name: Special handling
label.description: Description of any special handling measures required by the object.

label.name: Historical notes
label.description: Notes and supporting material relating to the historic significance of the object.

label.name: Source of historic notes
label.description: Source of historic notes. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Valuation
label.description: Assessed value of the object. You must specify the currency as either $

label.name: Valuation notes
label.description: Notes relating to the assessed value of the object

label.name: Accession date
label.description: Date on which the item was accessioned

label.name: Deaccession date
label.description: Date on which the item was deaccessioned

label.name: Deaccession notes
label.description: Notes relating to the deaccession of the object

label.name: Provenance
label.description: Provenance of the object.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Rights & restrictions
label.description: Narrative description of rights held and/or restrictions under which the item is bound.

label.name: Location description
label.description: Narrative description of item location. The location of an item should be recorded using the storage location hierarchy. This narrative field is a hold-over from the earlier CollectiveAccess 0.5x system and will eventually be removed.

label.name: Physical dimensions
label.description: Dimensions of item in inches. This text entry is a hold-over for the previous CollectiveAccess 0.5x system. The values in this field will be move to new structured system for entering dimensions

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Institution
label.description: Name of the institution to which the collection belongs.

label.name: Movement notes
label.description: Notes pertaining to this movement of the object.

label.name: Movement requested by
label.description: The name of the person who requested the movement.

label.name: Movement authorized by
label.description: The name of the person who authorized the movement.

label.name: Movement executed by
label.description: The name of the person who executed the movement.
